set terminal postscript eps enhanced
set output 'sodium-conv-dofs.eps'
set size 0.6, 0.6
set grid
set logscale y
set xlabel "DOFs"
set ylabel "relative H^1 error [%]"
plot '-' w l linetype 1 linewidth 3 title 'hp-FEM', '-' w l linetype 2 linewidth 2 title 'h-FEM, p = 2', '-' w l linetype 3 linewidth 2 title 'h-FEM, p = 1'
